attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,
re:Save Copenhagen Climate Change Issues

Dear Mr Brown, In response to a communication from Avaaz.org I am writing to seek your additional support in securing real change in the attitudes and approach to climate change...no body wins if we do not come together & work together..

1. NEGOTIATE:
European leaders must do all you can to rebuild trust with poorer countries by offering fairer and more ambitious proposals.

2.SPECIFY
EU contribution by 2020. 

3.IDENTIFY 
New funding sources eg, aviation and shipping revenues.  
(€135bn global figure-- in addition of aid promises already made).

4. DETERMINE 
Europe’s emission targets, making real cuts of 30%-40%.  
5.INVEST in (r&d etc)low-carbon alternatives.

regards,
alexandra martin
